suite.name: amazon tarefa2 BDD testes

test.name: Caso de Teste 03 - Adicionar Produto no Carrinho

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Dado que estou na home page da Amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Quando pesquisar pelo produto "Xbox Series S"
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Xbox Series S' into text field '(//input[@id='twotabsearchtextbox'])[1]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então um produto da linha "Xbox Series S" deve ser mostrado na página
Wait Until Element Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` contains ``text``.

kw.name: E adiciono o produto "Console Xbox Series S" no carrinho
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: E verifico se o produto "Console Xbox Series S" foi adicionado com sucesso
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element '(//h4[@class='a-alert-heading'][normalize-space()='Adicionado ao carrinho'])[2]' contains exact text 'Adicionado ao carrinho'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Esse teste verifica a adição de um produto no carrinho de compras

test.name: Caso de Teste 04 - Remover Produto do Carrinho

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Dado que estou na home page da Amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Quando pesquisar pelo produto "Xbox Series S"
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Xbox Series S' into text field '(//input[@id='twotabsearchtextbox'])[1]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então um produto da linha "Xbox Series S" deve ser mostrado na página
Wait Until Element Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` contains ``text``.

kw.name: E adiciono o produto "Console Xbox Series S" no carrinho
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: E verifico se o produto "Console Xbox Series S" foi adicionado com sucesso
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element '(//h4[@class='a-alert-heading'][normalize-space()='Adicionado ao carrinho'])[2]' contains exact text 'Adicionado ao carrinho'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Então removo o produto "Console Xbox Series S" do carrinho
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@id="sc-active-items-header"]' contains exact text 'Carrinho de compras'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.msg: Clicking button '(//button[@aria-label='Excluir Console Xbox Series S'])[1]'.
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element '(//div[@class='sc-list-item-removed-msg-delete a-padding-medium'])[1]' contains exact text 'Console Xbox Series S foi removido de Carrinho de compras.'.
kw.arg: expected=Console Xbox Series S foi removido de Carrinho de compras.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: E Verifico se o carrinho fica vazio
Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@id="sc-subtotal-label-activecart"]' contains exact text 'Subtotal (0 produtos):'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Esse teste verifica a remoção de um produto no carrinho de compras

suite.doc: Essa suite testa o site da Amazon.com.br
